title: Autonomous AGI Intent Schema V1
description: Defines the structure for formal intent requests processed by the Sovereign AGI kernel.

intent_id.description: Unique identifier for this specific intent (UUID v4).

version.description: Internal versioning of the intent payload structure.

source_module.description: The module that generated or submitted the intent (e.g., 'API_Gateway', 'Self_Correction_Loop').

type.description: High-level classification of the required action.

goal.description: A concise, actionable natural language statement defining the desired outcome.

parameters.description: Specific key/value pairs needed for execution by the intent handler.

required_capabilities.description: List of core capabilities or resources required (e.g., 'LLM_Access', 'FS_Write', 'GPU_Compute').

priority.description: Execution priority level, critical for scheduler weighting.

status.description: Current state of the intent within the execution lifecycle.

trace_history.description: Historical records of major processing steps and handler assignments.
